title: Dietary total antioxidant capacity in relation to disease severity and risk of mortality in cirrhosis; results from a cohort study
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Fereshteh Pashayee-Khamene, Melika Hajimohammadebrahim-Ketabforoush, Zeinab Heidari, Zahra Yari, Sara Karimi, Mahdi Saber-firoozi, Behzad Hatami, Azita Hekmatdoost
